Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Neilian Drive, south of the Dragon's Citadel.
Room.LongDescription: The powerful Dragon's Citadel is one of the few landmarks that have existed before the City of Oceancrest was actually built. On the south side of the road is the Temple of Harmonic Discord, an odd sort of group of people who try to solve problems without wars or other means of violence. This is, of course, impossible.
